getModelData() → {null|Object}

returns null, if not set or an object with human model specific data, e.g. - firstname (string) - lastname (string) - gender ("female" or "female) - height (number) - chest (numnber) - waist (number) - hips (number) - arms (number) - legs (number) all sizes are in metric unit mm
